content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1578262566673{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
Household

Ground screw systems for the consumer market.

Our easy-to-use and affordable ground screw systems are ideal for do-it-yourself home improvement, including light construction and recreational projects like umbrellas and sports netting. There are no concrete footings needed, so it’s easy to remove or relocate foundations later with minimal effort or wear and tear. Don’t let your next home improvement task or project keep you from getting the job done. When you know you need ground screws for household applications, you can trust American Ground Screw to be your partner. We offer custom designed and expertly crafted ground screws for mailboxes, flag poles, trampolines, gazebos, and much more. We have years of experience offering reliable and ICC-certified alternative foundation products for commercial and industrial applications. You can rest assured our ground screws for household applications will exceed your expectations and help you complete your home projects on time without wasting resources. Whether it’s a mailbox ground anchor, a heavy-duty trampoline anchor, or another alternative foundation product, American Ground Screw has you covered!

APPLICATIONS

Flagpoles

Wood Shed

Mailbox Post

Umbrella Footing

Trampoline

Birdhouses

Buy Now
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1587733019841{background-color: #f7f9fa !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]

Testimonials

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

This anchor worked perfect for my mailbox. There was no need to dig or use cement. We just screwed this into the ground and bolted the wood post onto it. Works perfect!! Highly recommend this. Just make sure to call for all utility lines prior to use.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

I built a custom $125k pool and these are one of my favorite things about the whole yard. I lined the West side of the pool with these in ground umbrella holders. When not in use they are hidden with covers that blend with the turf. This also prevents trip hazards.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Always difficult to judge something on line….. I needed a solutions for a small flag pole and did not want to dig and fill with cement and make a permanent pole site. This is perfect. And actually screwed right into the ground relatively easily. Great thing.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1587733019841{background-color: #f7f9fa !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Easy

A stable foundation ready in in a fraction of the time

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Cost-Effective

Save on materials and labor with no digging or concrete needed

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Customized

We can design and manufacture systems according to your needs

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Sustainable

Systems designed to minimize waste and environmental impact

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_inner_spacing=”30″ column_inner_padding=”” column_inner_mobipadding=””][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
